com.centurylink.mdw.cloud

Class CloudClassLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.ClassLoader
      • com.centurylink.mdw.cloud.CloudClassLoader

  • public class CloudClassLoader
extends java.lang.ClassLoader
    Used for Tomcat (and generally in cloud mode) to include Jar assets and library jars on the classpath.

      • hasClass

        public boolean hasClass(java.lang.String name)
        Looks for classes in Jar assets or on the prop-specified classpath. Results are cached, so Jar/CP changes require app redeployment.
